headline.main: British Air Aide, Off for Europe on Clipper, Says Russia Will Continue to Fight the Nazis

lead_paragraph: Russia will continue to "fight hard and well" regardless of the tide of immediate battles between the Red armies and the Nazi invaders, Captain Harold H. Balf our, British Parliamentary Under-Secretary for Air, asserted yesterday morning1 before boarding the Lisbon-bound Dixie Clipper at the marine terminal of La Guardia Field.
